page.title: 20Farming,Manor Farm,Stagsden
page.content: Operations here include 180 acres at Manor Farm,305 acres acres at Stevington Tithe Farm,112 acres at London Barn Farm and 360 acres outside the area.Rape,wheat,barley,and beans are grown and Turkeys raised.Farm machinery includes 12 tractors,2 J.C.B.s,5 crawlers,small crawler for spraying and 2 combines.All cultivation (ploughing, drilling, harrowing) is carried out by crawlers not only as this gives less compaction but also as the farm finds them cheaper to maintain.They bale 20,000 bales of straw each year for the Turkeys.A family farm employing 3 family members helped out by their wives plus 2 others and additional 5 students at harvest time.
